page.title: 12Gunnislake W.I.-Tamar Valley
page.content: "For Home and Country" The Gunnislake Women's Institute this year, 1985, celebrates its 52nd. birthday. The 28 members meet monthly in the church hall. The programme for this year is varied and includes Competitions, Talks and Discussions of interest to all members. Fund raising projects are organised to help people locally, nationally and world-wide, the latter especially for the benefit of women and children in the under-developed countries. Teas and entertainments are provided for the visiting elderly and handicapped people under the auspicies of Age Concern, Plymouth. The Institute joins with members from neighbouring groups in the Tamar Valley in all kinds of Leisure Activities.
